replies.bodyText:
I don't particularly mind the long range, though it may or may not be realistic for general scenarios.
I assume when you say it is always from the date you included, this is with the working of a specific application in mind, or is there some documentation on how to deal with the power failure event log that states this as a fixed value?
Although not all of us have lived long enough to have experienced time before the epoch time (1970-01-01), I either misunderstand your comment or have a radically different view of history or of Java at least (date/times before 1970 can certainly be handled as far as the Java related date time APIs I know of are concerned).
